description: Interactive minimap: add a minimap cursor that can be driven by mouse hover or keyboard, allow click-to-travel and click-to-look directly from the minimap overlay, and render a cursor highlight + helpful hint line.
summary: Minimap overlay now has its own cursor (UI-only) which is driven by mouse hover and/or keyboard movement.
While the minimap is open you can move the cursor with movement keys (including diagonals) and use ENTER to auto-travel or L to enter LOOK at the selected tile.
Mouse support: left-click on the minimap auto-travels; right-click enters LOOK at the clicked tile.
Renderer draws a cursor highlight on the minimap and shows a compact hint line + cursor coordinates.
